resources.string: Kassel is a city in the middle of Germany in the federal state Hessen. Due to it\'s past as a summer residence of monachs three castels are in Kassel. One near the city centre, the other two are located in the "Bergpark" together with the World Cultural Heritage "Herkules"
Itaque earum rerum hic tenetur a sapiente delectus
garden castel with a parc, near the city centre
A parc with a water garden and more sights worth seeing
Maison de plaisance of a monach in the Bergpark
Monument with the status as World cultural Heritage, located in the Bergpark
The castle of Wilhelmshöhe, located in the centre of the Bergpark
The ballroom building of the ancient Monarch, located in parc Bergpark
Best Pizza restaurant often filled with students
best Bar in town, often filled with students. Located in the Friedrichstraße
